quest.name: Serpent's Tongue-lashing
journal: Ahtzatrach seeks a sword hand swift and stout.
Ahtzatrach hopes to chip away at the Serpent Reavers' numbers prior to battle, and asks you to slay five of their kind.
You have done the deed. Report your success to Ahtzatrach.
Ahtzatrach is elated that the Serpent Reavers will need to lick their wounds a bit.

dialogue.name: AHTZATRACH
dialogue.text: Serpent Reavers are pirates who take the Sahagin's god as their own. What sorry sort of pirate offers prayers to Leviathan?

dialogue.name: AHTZATRACH
dialogue.text: Like all zealots, their fervor grows with their numbers. Subtracting five fanatics from their fold ought to dampen their fire a while.

dialogue.name: AHTZATRACH
dialogue.text: That'll teach those Reavers that they reap what they sow! Rest assured in the knowledge you've made the seas safer for all.

obj.n: Long Walk off a Short Pier
